Class BinaryArraySolution

    A Solution represented on an array of 0 and 1 (NumericalRepresentation is used).

      • mutate

        public void mutate(double pm)
        Description copied from class: Solution
        Mutate (change) this solution's representation with regards to pm - possibility of mutation.
        Specified by:
        mutate in class Solution
        Parameters:
        pm - A random chosen double (0 < pm < 1) that should give the random element in this solution's mutation.

      • crossover

        public Solution crossover(Solution partner,
                          double cp)
        Description copied from class: Solution
        Crossover this solution with the given partner. In other words, create a new solution with data taken from both this solution and the partner.
        Specified by:
        crossover in class Solution
        Parameters:
        partner - Another solution.
        cp - Crossover probability.
        Returns:
        The newly created solution.
